divs: sighting detailsdriving north into chama new mexico i noticed chemtrails in the area of dulce new mexico at 9:15am. dulce new mexico is world famous for the ufo base (rumored) and attracts many people to this area. it is apparent that chemtrails are put in place so people cannot see what is flying above them, around them, etc. i understood that chemtrails were put in place to make people sick. from the looks of this i am beginning to suspect that chemtrails are also used to keep people from seeing what is above them such as ufo crafts and also the possiblity of planet x. dulce new mexico is a tiny town and there is no reason for the government to spend thousand of dollars to make a few hundred people sick. the government\alien agenda is covering up the sky in that area for obvious reasons.
Summary: Chemtrails in Dulce, New Mexico area.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chama
There was one other sighting in Chama on or around January 30th 2010
